targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="system", instance="storage.home"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="storage.home"}[$__rate_interval])))
